page.title: 20COUNDON SURVEY FIVE
page.content:
LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES
COUNTY St.JOSEPHS CHURCHGOER 19.0% 96.6% WORKMEN'S CLUB 75.0% 93.3% SPORTS TEAM 17.0% 36.6% SPORTS SPECTATOR 32.0% 53.3% USES LIBRARY 71.0% 80.0%
The survey results for leisure time activities show a significant difference between families sending children to the two schools. Those supplying the Roman Catholic School showing a higher level of involvement in all categories. The figures referring to churchgoers are misleading since St. Joseph's is a church school.
